item.title: Italy
item.description: San Candido The aire was just a car park but the town was quite nice and it only cost â‚¬3. Just one night and a coffee here then on to Arco {{ more }} Arco Sun 20th Busy roads today on single carriage way with a few dogy passing manoeuvres arrived at the aire around 14:45 in blazing hot sun and the place was packed. Walked around the old town and then up to the castle.
